framework.objects

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.core.UpdateObject
      • framework.objects.CanvasObject
        • framework.objects.Square
          • framework.objects.Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseControl, Clickable, Collisionable, Updateable, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener

    public class Rectangle
extends Square
    The Class Rectangle that is used to draw colored rectangles, receive events, check collision and so on.
    Author:
    Hans Ferchland

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Instantiates a new rectangle at default position and default size.
      Rectangle(int xPos, int yPos, int width, int height, Color color)
      Instantiates a new rectangle with given position, color and size.
